aboutDescription: ANBT is a decentralized platform where any user can issue their own token. But with one important rule: the creator is obliged to lock their tokens for 3 months. This proves that they are serious. The application has successfully passed the test of user role distribution, chat processing and secure user registration. The trial test of token creation on the platform was successful. This function will appear in the application when the plan is 70% fulfilled. When it is 100%, the ANBT team will decide to add a function to the application about token creation in the Solana network
principlesSubtitle: The foundation of our decentralized platform

create.title: Create your token
create.description: Simple token creation on a decentralized platform with an intuitive interface

prove.title: Prove seriousness
prove.description: Mandatory locking of tokens by the creator for 3 months to prove intent

trust.title: Build trust
trust.description: Honesty and transparency in every token launch to build community trust

footer.description: Decentralized platform for honest token launches
